Let's raise the visiblity of documentation in Ruby!

This page is for rrrene/sparkr. It is part of a project called "Inch Pages", showing documentation measurement provided by Inch. Inch Pages also provide a badge:

Can I have my own badges?

Sure!

What is the goal of this?

I really think that posting badges for documentation in READMEs will benefit you (because people can see that your project is well documented) and our community in general by improving the visibility of documentation.

Let's start a discussion, let's raise the visibility of documentation, let's talk.

Suggestions, feedback, critique: Hit me up on Twitter or via issue.

# Inch Pages

built with GitHub Pages, Jekyll, Poole, Octokit, Gems and Inch.
